content.rendered:
Directed bY Jeethu Joseph

Written by Sunir Kheterpal .K.R. Krishna Kumar

Cast Mohanlal (Chandrasekhar). Shivada Nair (Dr. Nayana). Chandhunath G. Nair (Jithesh (as Chandunath)). Priyanka Nair (Annie). Unni Mukundan (Zakariah). Anusree (Shiny). Saiju Kurup (Mathew). Anu Sithara (Merin). Rahul Madhav (Sam). Aditi Ravi (Aarathi). Anu Mohan (Siddharth). Leona Lishoy (Fida). Gibin Gopinath (Bus Driver). Nandu (Davis). Pradeep Chandran (Vipin). Disney James (Biju). Siddique (Psychiatrist). Chali Pala (Chemmeen Jose). Jomon (Vijayan). Arfaz Ayub (Suresh). Kalabhavan Jinto (Chef). Aju Varghese (Sajish (voice)). Mallika Sukumaran (Zakariah’s Mother (voice)). Murali Gopy (Sreekumar (voice)). Irshad (Jose (voice)). Kannan Pattambi (Kumar). Pradeep Kottayam (Siddharth’s Uncle (voice)). Javad Hussain (Sunil). Gautam Raghavan (Resort Staff). Rajeev Kovilakom (Resort Staff). Martin Joseph (Resort Staff). Sidharth Varma (Harshan)

Language Malayalam

Producers Antony Perumbavoor

Production Aashirvad Cinemas
